snippet.title: Existence: The Outer Reach - Atomic Bomb Teaser
snippet.description:
The atomic bomb is a late game ability that will be available by building a missile silo on the same planet you are attacking or by equipping it to a starship that you have in orbit. It will destroy all units in a sector, even your own, so use it wisely!

Check out Existence at: https://jappleseed.itch.io/existence
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/TWtHmEPZbp
